name: SIDECAR GUIDANCE MUTE
effect: Choose a ranged weapon. You may activate this mod as a quick action to ignore the Ordnance, Inaccurate, and Experimental tags on that weapon until the end of the current turn.

actions.name: Activate Sidecar
actions.detail: Ignore the Ordnance, Inaccurate, and Experimental tags on this weapon until the end of the current turn.

description: Rather than a traditional ballistic oubliette, SIDECAR mutes retain a hardlink to the core chassis OS. This allows them to achieve much greater predictive recalibration, at the expense of transfer/response rates.
